name: Stop Online - Battle of Words
description: Stop Online is a multiplayer battle of words game where you compete with several players aiming to challenge them on their knowledge of words, trying to be the quickest to respond in order to achieve the highest rank. The words are in your language and you will challenge players in the same language.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Love it, good fun! even if you can't think of a word, other peoples words will amaze you, and guess what?? they may even educate you with some new words 10/10  #1 for life.

Battle of Words is to a vocabulary test, what Quiplash is to Cards Against Humanity. That is, it's a game of solid skill and knowledge, but with concomitant room for creativity and just generally ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥tting your way to victory. Quickthinking, general knowledge, expansive vocabulary, and a good sense of humour are what's required to win this game, and even if you barely fulfil any of the listed criteria, you're still going to have an amazingly fun and often hysterical time.  Be warned, however, that the game is low on population. 3-4 player games still make for great fun, however, so don't let that deter you; especially if you have a friend tagging along.

Extremely fun little game for playing with friends. It is so much fun hopping on this game with some friends on Skype and challenging each other. It's a nice casual break from more involved stuff and is great for a little chill session. Plus, for £4 and endless replayability I think it is an absolute bargin. Very stable and function game, with an attractive GUI that is super easy to use. Dev is very involved online and I am very hopeful for the future of this game and any others he brings out in the future
Great concept, great game, great fun. Just needs more players

Got keys to test the game from the developer.  Pros:  Really enjoying the game with my friends and family. Family friendly and can be played in more languages than the game provide with.   The game itself is really clean and easy to find in menu and in-game.  Cons  The game needs like a tutorial because I had trouble in the beggining, but it was fast and easy to learn. Took 1-2 games!

Only multi-player? No wonder this game is dead with no signs of recovery. Learn something from other 'word games' , add a single challenges or something if u wanna have at least some % of people playing the game and maybe multi-player will come naturally.

I was gifted this game. Thank you :) If you have played the board game 'Scattergories' then you will like this game! This is such a fun game where you have five categories, the game will give you a letter and you have to use that letter to come up with a word that you would find in that category! This game is very addicting!
Utter garbage on Linux (Ubuntu 15.10). Game begins to stutter and become unresponsive seconds into starting, and eventually either freezes or you get a network error. Horrible.
